text: EXCLUSIVE : After a series of tests, Grey Damon ( Aquarius ), Hamilton ’ s Okieriete Onaodowan, Danielle Savre ( Too Close To Home ), and Barrett Doss ( Marvel ’ s Iron Fist ) have been cast as series regulars in the upcoming Grey ’ s Anatomy firefighters spinoff opposite Jaina Lee Ortiz and the mothership series ’ Jason George. The 10 - episode drama, which follows a group of heroic firefighters, hails from Grey ’ s Anatomy creator Shonda Rhimes ’ Shondaland. Courtesy of Disney Set in a Seattle firehouse, the spinoff is being written by Grey ’ s executive producer / co - showrunner Stacy McKee.
